articles.title: Senate confirms Trump’s nominee to run NIH - The Hill
articles.description: The Senate on Tuesday confirmed health researcher Jay Bhattacharya as the next leader of the National Institutes of Health (NIH).  Bhattacharya was confirmed on a party- line vote, 53 to 47.  Bhattacharya became a celebrity among many Americans during the COV…
